languages.text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк таинственно исчез. Среди черни немедленно поползли слухи о его чудесном вознесении, а вскоре нашлись и свидетели такового.{/n}
{n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet mysteriously vanished. Rumours of his miraculous ascension immediately spread among the rabble, and soon there were those claiming to have witnessed the event.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Чистоголосый пророк таинственно исчез. Среди черни немедленно поползли слухи о его чудесном вознесении, а вскоре нашлись и свидетели такового.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El profeta de voz pura desaparece misteriosamente. Los rumores de su milagrosa ascensión corren como reguero de pólvora entre el populacho. Pronto aparecen quienes afirman haberla presenciado.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet mysteriously vanished. Rumours of his miraculous ascension immediately spread among the rabble, and soon there were those claiming to have witnessed the event.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El profeta de voz pura desaparece misteriosamente. Los rumores de su milagrosa ascensión corren como reguero de pólvora entre el populacho. Pronto aparecen quienes afirman haberla presenciado.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le prophète à la voix pure s'est volatilisé mystérieusement. La rumeur de son ascension miraculeuse s'est immédiatement répandue parmi la populace, au point que certains prétendent maintenant avoir vu le miracle de leurs yeux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet mysteriously vanished. Rumours of his miraculous ascension immediately spread among the rabble, and soon there were those claiming to have witnessed the event.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prophète à la voix pure s'est volatilisé mystérieusement. La rumeur de son ascension miraculeuse s'est immédiatement répandue parmi la populace, au point que certains prétendent maintenant avoir vu le miracle de leurs yeux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}纯洁之声先知就这样神秘地消失了。他已圆满升天的传言在人群中传播开来，随后立刻有人宣称他们亲眼见证了这一神迹。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet mysteriously vanished. Rumours of his miraculous ascension immediately spread among the rabble, and soon there were those claiming to have witnessed the event.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}纯洁之声先知就这样神秘地消失了。他已圆满升天的传言在人群中传播开来，随后立刻有人宣称他们亲眼见证了这一神迹。{/n}

languages.text: {n}純声の預言者が謎の失踪を遂げた。彼の奇跡的な昇天の噂は、またたくまに民衆の間に広まり、すぐにその出来事を目撃したという者が現れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet mysteriously vanished. Rumours of his miraculous ascension immediately spread among the rabble, and soon there were those claiming to have witnessed the event.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}純声の預言者が謎の失踪を遂げた。彼の奇跡的な昇天の噂は、またたくまに民衆の間に広まり、すぐにその出来事を目撃したという者が現れた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Prophet mit der Reinen Stimme ist auf mysteriöse Weise verschwunden. Im Pöbel verbreiteten sich augenblicklich Gerüchte von seinem wundersamen Aufstieg. Schon bald behaupteten einige, Zeuge dieses Ereignisses gewesen zu sein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Pure-Voiced Prophet mysteriously vanished. Rumours of his miraculous ascension immediately spread among the rabble, and soon there were those claiming to have witnessed the event.{/n}
